# rating

**Instance Property**

The driver’s current rating.

## Declaration

```swift
var rating: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

Siri displays the string you provide when displaying the status of a ride request.

## Getting the Driver Information

- **phoneNumber**: The driver’s phone number.
title: rating
